Package persistence

Interface PersistenceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostgreManager
    public interface PersistenceInterface
    responsible for keeping the Dependency Inversion principle

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Chat> getAllChats()
      returns all stored chats
      java.util.ArrayList<Department> getAllDepartments()
      returns all stored departments
      java.util.ArrayList<Employee> getAllEmployees()
      returns all stored employees
      java.util.ArrayList<Message> getAllMessages()
      returns all stored messages
      Chat newChat​(java.lang.String name, boolean isGroup, int[] members)
      returns a newly created chat read from persistence with the values inputted in the constructor
      Department newDepartment()
      returns a newly created department with default values
      Employee newEmployee()
      returns a newly created employee with default values
      Message newMessage​(java.lang.String message, int sender, int chatID)
      returns a newly created message read from persistence with the values inputted in the constructor
      void removeChat​(int chatID)
      deletes a chat
      void removeDepartment​(int departmentID)
      deletes a department
      Chat updateChat​(Chat chat)
      updates a chat's attributes and returns a chat which matches the updated data, read from the persistence
      (this is used to ensure that the business layer has the same data which is in the persistence)
      Department updateDepartment​(Department department)
      updates a department's attributes and returns a department which matches the updated data, read from the persistence
      (this is used to ensure that the business layer has the same data which is in the persistence)
      Employee updateEmployee​(Employee employee)
      updates an employee's attributes and returns an employee which matches the updated data, read from the persistence
      (this is used to ensure that the business layer has the same data which is in the persistence)
